name: Cleaning Robot: Subservient
description:
Write out a task list to help your friendly pet robot clean a house.

Commands:

FWDMove forward one square.
CLMClimb up over the edge of a rug.
RGTTurn right.
LFTTurn left.
VACVacuum up dirt on carpet flooring.
MOPMop up stains on tile flooring.
JMP X
Jump to the line number specified.
